blogPost.excerpt: Mentioned.app is a simple analytics tool that lets you track your website mentions in real-time. Receive an email notification every time your website is mentioned. Track site visits from each link and measure value. Best part? It's Free.
blogPost.body: Mentioned.app is a simple analytics tool that lets you track your website mentions in real-time. Receive an email notification every time your website is mentioned. Track site visits from each link and measure value. Best part? It's Free.
blogPost.title: Mentioned - Get an email when your website is posted online.
blogPost.author: Daniel Rongo

localize.description: app是一个简单的分析工具，可以让你实时跟踪网站的提及。每次提到您的网站时都会收到电子邮件通知。跟踪每个链接的站点访问量并衡量价值。最精彩的部分？这是免费的。
localize.tagline: 当您的网站在线发布时，收到一封电子邮件。

localize.description: app是一個簡單的分析工具，可以讓你實時跟蹤網站的提及。每次提到您的網站時都會收到電子郵件通知。跟蹤每個鏈接的站點訪問量並衡量價值。最精彩的部分？這是免費的。
localize.tagline: 當您的網站在線發佈時，收到一封電子郵件。

previous.excerpt: Bitbo is a real-time Bitcoin dashboard that allows anyone to monitor on-chain data, view live price action, and track key economic indicators - all for free.
previous.title: Bitbo - Real-time Bitcoin dashboard

localize.description: Bitbo是一个实时的比特币仪表盘，任何人都可以通过它监控链条上的数据，查看实时价格走势，并跟踪关键的经济指标-所有这些都是免费的。
Bitbo是一個實時的比特幣儀表盤，任何人都可以通過它監控鏈條上的數據，查看實時價格走勢，並跟蹤關鍵的經濟指標-所有這些都是免費的。

next.excerpt: A free illustrations library to help the community discover unique collections from illustrators around the world.
next.title: Vektors - Find free illustration packs for all your needs.

localize.description: 一个免费的插图图书馆，帮助社区发现来自世界各地插图画家的独特收藏。
localize.tagline: 查找满足您所有需求的免费插图包。

localize.description: 一個免費的插圖圖書館，幫助社區發現來自世界各地插圖畫家的獨特收藏。
localize.tagline: 查找滿足您所有需求的免費插圖包。
